seo.title: Email Verification â€“ Paris 2024 Olympic Ticketing
seo.description: Confirm your email address to activate your account. Click the link in the email you received to verify your address.

success.title: Email Verified!
success.message: Your email address has been successfully confirmed. You can now log in.

invalid.title: Invalid Link
invalid.message: This verification link is invalid or has expired. Please try logging in to receive a new verification link.

alreadyVerified.title: Already Verified
alreadyVerified.message: Your email address has already been confirmed. You may log in.

error.title: An Error Occurred
error.message: We couldn't verify your email. Please try again or contact support.
